content:
Our lovely hand crafted Bee Houses are drilled with 8mm diameter holes, the perfect size for solitary bees in the Uk. They have an overhanging roof to provide a little protection from the rain.

Your Bee House will be best sited with a south / south east siting that gets morning sun, this is supposed to be best, as the bees need warmth to get going first thing, also a sheltered spot might be best and not in a wind tunnel.

As long as you have flowers in your garden the bees will be happy.

Manufactured from high quality pressure treated European Redwood (Pine) PEFC 32 x 150, with all stainless steel hardware.
Title: Bee Houses
description: Our beautiful hand crafted Bee Houses are drilled with 8mm diameter holes, the perfect size for Masonry Bees. We use treated wood and stainless hardware.
imageAlt: A wall mounting bee house, with holes drilled for solitary bees

content:
Our delightful Bee Logs are designed to become a home for solitary bees.

Your bee Logs will be best sited with a south / south east siting that gets morning sun, this is supposed to be best, as the bees need warmth to get going first thing, also a sheltered spot might be best and not in a wind tunnel.

They are manufactured from Uk sourced logs and are from a variety of species of trees.

They are supplied with a Zinc plated eyelet and strong hemp cord, mounted in the centre of the log length to provide balance.

Please note that over time the bark will part from the log and cracks may appear in the log, this is all part of the ageing process.
Title: Bee Logs
description: Our delightful Bee Logs are designed to become home for solitary bees. Solitary bees arenâ€™t like honeybees that live in hives but instead use holes.
imageAlt: Wooden log with hook and rope for hanging, drilled in the ends for Solitary bees

content:
A lovely hand crafted Bird Box, these bird boxes have a varying size entrance holes which are the preferred sizes for birds such as Blue and Great Tits, Sparrows and Starlings.

We supply four sizes of entrance hole, 25mm, 28mm, 32mm and 45mm.

These boxes come fitted with a single hole mounting plate made from stainless steel.
 
Manufactured from high quality pressure treated European Redwood (Pine) PEFC 32 x 150, with all stainless steel hardware.
Title: Bird Box
description: A lovely hand crafted Bird Box, these bird boxes have a varying size entrance holes.
imageAlt: Bird Nesting Box In A Tree

content:
A lovely hand crafted Bird Box, these bird boxes have a varying size entrance holes which are formed by a pre-fitted stainless steel plate, these form holes of preferred sizes for birds such as Blue and Great Tits, Sparrows and Starlings.

The entrance hole plates stop predators opening out the hole and either killing the nesting birds or taking up residence themselves.

We supply four sizes of entrance hole, 25mm, 28mm, 32mm and 45mm.

These boxes come fitted with a single hole mounting plate made from stainless steel.
 
Manufactured from high quality pressure treated European Redwood (Pine) PEFC 32 x 150, with all stainless steel hardware.
Title: Bird Box With Plate
description: A lovely hand crafted Bird Box, these bird boxes have a varying size entrance holes.
imageAlt: Bird Nesting Box In A Tree

content:
A lovely hand crafted Luxury Robin Bird Box. Robins prefer an partially open fronted box with about 100mm behind the closed section, occasionally Wrens may take up residence.

These boxes come fitted with a single hole mounting plate made from stainless steel.
 
Manufactured from high quality pressure treated European Redwood (Pine) PEFC 32 x 150, with all stainless steel hardware.
Title: Bird Box, Robin
description: A lovely hand crafted Luxury Robin Bird Box. Robins prefer an partially open fronted box with about 100mm behind the closed section.
imageAlt: Bird Nesting Box In A Tree

content:
A lovely hand crafted Square Shaped Bird Box, these bird boxes have a larger opening at the front, the preferred entrance style for Robins.

We fit a stainless steel mounting plate to these boxes which allows them to be screwed to any convenient tree, post or wall.

Manufactured from high quality pressure treated European Redwood (Pine) PEFC 32 x 150, with all stainless steel hardware.

content:
A lovely hand crafted Insect Hotel, designed to become home to some of the important insects for you garden.

We include blocks drilled with 8mm diameter holes, the ideal size for Solitary bees, including Mason, Leafcutter and Carpenter bees. We also use Fir cones and other natural materials to create a multi insect habitat suitable for a wide range of insects and bugs.

Manufactured from high quality pressure treated European Redwood (Pine) PEFC 32 x 150, with all stainless steel hardware.

We can at extra cost supply the Plant Theatre painted in a Cuprinol outdoor wood stain, the only colour we supply is Ash Black.

content:
These lovely hand made Cosmos type flowers will add a little bit of height to any garden or border.

We manufacture them in a range of 'openness' and with straight or curved stakes, the choice is then yours.

The stake is from 6mm steel and approximately 100cm tall so these flowers will move in the wind.
Title: Steel Cosmos
description: These lovely hand made Cosmos type flowers will add a little bit of brightness to any garden or border.
imageAlt: A formed metal cosmos type flower  head on a steel stake

content:
Our hand crafted Echinacea type flower will add a little bit of class to any garden or border.

These are our take on a Echinacea type flower, we manufacture them in a range of 'openness' and with straight of bend stakes, the choice is then yours.

The stake is from 6mm steel and approximately 100cm tall so these Echinacea type flowers will move in the wind.
Title: Steel Echinacea
description: Our hand crafted Echinacea type flower will add a little bit of class to any garden or border.
imageAlt: A formed metal echinacea type flower head on a steel stake

content:
This lovely hand-made Fern frond will add interest to any garden or border, they can look great as a collection of several fronds together.

This is our interpretation on a fern, often found in the UK countryside. We manufacture with a ground stake and they are made from 2mm steel so will gently sway in the wind.

The fronds can be bent by hand to give the shape that you prefer. As they are made from untreated steel so the fronds will over time rust to give a lovely patina.
Title: Steel Fern
description: This lovely hand-made Fern frond will add interest to any garden or border, they can look great as a collection of several fronds together.
imageAlt: A steel fern frond mounted on a steel stake.

content:
This lovely hand-made Fern collection will add interest to any garden or border.

This is our interpretation on a fern, often found in the UK countryside. We manufacture them on a base with a ground stake. The fronds themselves are made from 2mm steel so will gently sway in the wind.

The fronds can be bent by hand to give the shape that you prefer. As they are made from untreated steel so the fronds will over time rust to give a lovely patina.
Title: Steel Fern, Multi Stem
description: This lovely hand-made group of Fern fronds will add interest to any garden or border, they can look great as a collection of several fronds together.
imageAlt: A steel fern frond collection mounted on a steel base with ground stake.

content:
These hand crafted steel wreaths would make a great statement piece for the entrance to your home our as a centre piece on a table.

We manufacture our wreaths with a steel support ring and attached laser cut leaf profiles, each wreath is unique and one of a kind

Left untreated these will rust to give a lovely warm patina.
Title: Steel Wreath
description: These hand crafted Steel Wreaths would make a great statement piece for the entrance to your home our as a centre piece on a table.
imageAlt: Rusty steel leaf shapes mounted to form a round wreath shape
